name: 100 Seconds (itch)
description: The main goal is to survive for 100 seconds.  One-hit kills enabled.  The difficulty varies based on the color of cube you've chosen.  Can you survive for 100 seconds with every single color?  Few people have enjoyed the game enough to even attempt that.  If you do survive for 100 seconds, you get to see your cube wearing a cool hat.  Have fun, thanks for playing.
